entry.title: Why I Switched from VS Code to Neovim
entry.summary: After 5 years of using VS Code, I made the switch to Neovim. Here's what I learned about modal editing, configuration as code, and why I'm never going back.

entry.title: Building CLI Tools with TypeScript in 2024
entry.summary: TypeScript has become an excellent choice for CLI development. This guide covers the best practices, libraries, and patterns for building robust command-line tools.

entry.title: Understanding the XDG Base Directory Specification
entry.summary: Where should your app store config files? The XDG Base Directory Specification provides a standard answer. Here's how to implement it correctly.

entry.title: RSS is Not Dead: Building Modern Feed Readers
entry.summary: Despite social media's dominance, RSS remains the best way to follow content on your own terms. Here's how to build a modern RSS reader.
